_Global-.PackageReleaseNotes: The 0.1.3 SkiaSharp Update fixes the incorrectly calculated descent of large operators' lower limits.

CSharpMath.Title: CSharpMath
CSharpMath.Description: C# LaTeX math rendering engine core. Can display beautiful math equations and symbols. Needs a front end to function. Currently, front ends exist for iOS, SkiaSharp and Xamarin.Forms.

CSharpMath.Rendering.Title: CSharpMath.Rendering
CSharpMath.Rendering.Description: Rendering interface fror CSharpMath using the Typography library.

CSharpMath.Ios.Title: CSharpMath.Ios
CSharpMath.Ios.Description: The iOS front end for CSharpMath.

CSharpMath.SkiaSharp.Title: CSharpMath.SkiaSharp
CSharpMath.SkiaSharp.Description: The SkiaSharp front end for CSharpMath.

CSharpMath.Forms.Title: CSharpMath.Forms
CSharpMath.Forms.Description: The Xamarin.Forms front end for CSharpMath.
